Actions.Name: Raze
Actions.Effects: All foes in range 2 take 2 damage.

Actions.Name: Mancatcher
Actions.Description: A character in range 2 is shoved 1 towards the Enforcer.

Actions.Name: Bolas
Actions.Description: A foe in range 3 is winded. Winded foes must save or become stunned.

Actions.Name: Kidnap
Actions.Description: The enforcer dashes in a straight line 3 spaces, phasing through characters. The first character it encounters is shoved along with the Enforcer to the end of the line, then shoved 1.
